title: Quick tomato and mozzarella pizza
ingredients: ['For the dough', '315g plain flour', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 teaspoons (7g) dried active yeast', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '240ml warm water', 'For the topping', '2 cloves of garlic', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '250g tinned chopped tomatoes', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '150g mozzarella cheese', '1 bunch basil']
